Reviews.Title: I want to return it!! its horrible!!!
Reviews.Author: Luther Anderson
Reviews.Content: I hate this tablet the resolution is extremely poor and the battery life is extremelyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy poor I cant use it for 10 minutes and I really mean 10 minutes without it dying. is there anyway i can return this tablet and purchase a better one? This is very unacceptable. I literally cannot take it of the charger for 10 minutes without it dying and no apps are on. I want to return it for a better one

Reviews.Title: Awful Screen Display!
Reviews.Author: James Porter
Reviews.Content: This tablet is not for a person who plans to really use it to do important things. The screen is awful and I really would want to return it. It may work for children.

Reviews.Title: well worth the money!
Reviews.Author: James Thurman
Reviews.Content: bought it as a gift for my grandaughter, she loves it, never puts it down. she truely gets full enjoyment out of it. she is three years old and it has been very educational for her, i am very glad i made the purchase!

Reviews.Title: Lemon
Reviews.Author: Lori P.
Reviews.Content: I sent the tablet back. The battery would not stay charged. It had a static noise all the time and everything was in Chinese and I couldn't change the language. It was a lemon!!!

Reviews.Title: Good Products
Reviews.Author: Chris C.
Reviews.Content: My friend recommend the tablet, the told me it is very good product, fast and easy play, I check the description is great.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: Trisha harrison
Reviews.Content: I find this tablet has Very poor picture quality. The max volume is not loud at all, we have yo strain to hear it.

Reviews.Title: Not happy
Reviews.Author: butterflyliz
Reviews.Content: It arrived on time. Well that's good.  For a week. It worked fine.  But the charging. Doesn't work anymore after a week. I plug it.  And it won't charge. You can only charge it. Thru the USB. When at a computer. And unfortunately  I don't have a PC.  So. This tablet. Is a good tablet. But mine came with a defective. Charging port. And. Customer service wants. You to explain  that like a 100 times.  Oh. I also. Tried.  Another charger. From. The same tablet. My daughter has.  It won't charge. And it loose.

Reviews.Title: Nice product
Reviews.Author: Marlene Bates
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet for my 10yr old grandson. He is very pleased with it. He can do everything on it that Ican do on my much more expensive Samsung. Well worth the price! I recommend this product, you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: SVP Tablet
Reviews.Author: Susan Fasano
Reviews.Content: I like the fact that you can use this anywhere you go.  Like to watch movies on it while I work.

Reviews.Title: broken Christmas, broken childs heart,
Reviews.Author: Charles Bradshaw jr
Reviews.Content: It was not replaced! Amazon should have sent me another tablet.  I spent $90. This was a rip off deal. People shop local for your electronic goods.  that way it would not be a issue. You still have my money.
